Question: Hanyang University, ERICA Campus CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Hanyang University, ERICA Campus

eZ SPC Software

- Developed by Dr. Chang W. Kang, professor, Department of Industrial & Management Engineering
- Includes basic QC tools, probability distributions, descriptive statistics, graphical analysis, control charts, process capability analysis, gage R&R, interval estimation, hypothesis tests, regression analysis, analysis of variance, and factorial design
- Accompanies the book "Basic Statistical Tools for Improving Quality," Chang W. Kang and Paul H. Kvam, Wiley, 2011

IT Service

- Eduroam (education roaming) provides global wireless roaming service for international research and education community
- Allows access to wireless service of all education institutes around the globe with no additional verification process
- Hanyang email accounts are in the form of “ID@hanyang.ac.kr” and can be used on smartphones supported by other email programs such as Outlook

Internet Access

- Free internet access available all across campus
- Ways to access free internet may differ depending on the devices and OS environment

Campus Locations

- 222, Wangsimni-ro, Seongdong-gu, Seoul, 04763, Korea
- 55 Hanyangdeahak-ro, Sangnok-gu, Ansan, Gyeonggi-do, 15588, Korea

Summary_cn:
汉阳大学，ERICA校区

eZ SPC软件

- 由工业与管理工程学系教授Chang W. Kang博士开发
- 包括基本的质量控制工具，概率分布，描述性统计，图形分析，控制图，过程能力分析，测量系统评估与改进，区间估计，假设检验，回归分析，方差分析和因子设计
- 附带书籍《基本统计工具用于提高质量》，作者Chang W. Kang与Paul H. Kvam，Wiley出版，2011年

IT服务

- Eduroam（教育漫游）为国际研究和教育社区提供全球无线漫游服务
- 可以无需额外的验证过程访问全球所有教育机构的无线服务
- 汉阳的电子邮件账户形式为“ID@hanyang.ac.kr”，可以在支持其他邮件程序（如Outlook）的智能手机上使用

互联网接入

- 全校范围内提供免费互联网接入
- 具体的免费互联网接入方式可能因设备和操作系统环境而异

校园位置

- 韩国首尔市城东区汪津里222号，邮编04763
- 韩国京畿道安山市汉阳大学大学路55号，邮编15588
